alert.note: Alert for Forest; Venango (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 7:08PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN VENANGO AND NORTHERN FOREST COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM EDT... At 708 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Sheffield to near Titusville. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Pleasantville, Kellettville, West Hickory, East Hickory, and Starr. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
